players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Please vote Charlie."
You: "Did you investigate Charlie? What evidence did you find?"
Charlie: "Bob, I think you might be the mafia because you didn't investigate me."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob, I didn't investigate you because I had to investigate Charlie. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Diana, thank you for investigating. I didn't investigate Charlie because I had no reason. Charlie, I'm not mafia."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Please vote Charlie."
Bob: "Did you investigate Charlie? What evidence did you find?"
You: "Bob, I think you might be the mafia because you didn't investigate me."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob, I didn't investigate you because I had to investigate Charlie. Vote Charlie."
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Diana, thank you for investigating. I didn't investigate Charlie because I had no reason. Charlie, I'm not mafia."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Please vote Charlie."
Bob: "Did you investigate Charlie? What evidence did you find?"
Charlie: "Bob, I think you might be the mafia because you didn't investigate me."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob, I didn't investigate you because I had to investigate Charlie. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.
Bob: "Diana, thank you for investigating. I didn't investigate Charlie because I had no reason. Charlie, I'm not mafia."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
